cause.description:
on february 22, 2005 the most incredible band on earth broke up, not only did the band break apart but so did the hearts of millions.




please support, and invite your friends!


1. blink-182 has written over 100 great songs, i would like over 100 more 2. "let's make this last forever"
cause.mission: to put the best band ever back into the studio, and not as (+44) or angels & airwaves.
cause.name: bring blink back
